FABattlemaps.BattlemapNotFound: Battlemap not found. Please refresh and try again.
FABattlemaps.DownloaderStatusGenericErro: An error occurred. Please refresh and try again.
FABattlemaps.DownloaderStatusWrongVersio: Cannot download map as your Forgotten Adventures Battlemaps module is out of date. You must have version {version} or higher installed.
Out of date module version detected.
FABattlemaps.HighQualityMapsHint: By default, 100 DPI maps will be downloaded. Choosing HQ maps will download 200 DPI assets instead. Please note that in most cases 200 DPI is not needed and may result in performance issues.
FABattlemaps.ImportExistsContent3: Do you wish to replace the existing scene?
FABattlemaps.ImportNotFound: "{name}" could not be found in the compendium pack.
FABattlemaps.LoadErrorFallbackMaps: Failed to load battlemaps. Utilising fallback.
FABattlemaps.LoadErrorFallbackTags: Failed to load tags. Utilising fallback.
FABattlemaps.NoAccessDetail: Please use the "Login with Patreon" button in the top right of the main Forgotten Adventures Battlemaps window to login prior to downloading this map.
FABattlemaps.NoAccessTitle: You must authenticate with Patreon first.
FABattlemaps.PatreonLoginTimeoutContent: Authentication with Patreon timed out. Please try again.
FABattlemaps.PatreonLoginWaitContent: Please authorize the Patreon login in the other window. If you did not see another window open, please check for blocked popups.
FABattlemaps.PatreonLogout: Click to log out of Patreon.
FABattlemaps.ShowAssetDownloaderHint: Shows the Forgotten Adventures Asset Downloader
FABattlemaps.ShowSidebarButtonHint: Include the asset downloader button on the Scene tab. Changing this value will require a refresh.
FABattlemaps.ShowSidebarButtonName: Show button on Scene Directory tab
FABattlemaps.Title: Forgotten Adventures
FABattlemaps.WrongAccessDetail: You do not have the correct {link} membership level. Premium battlemaps require the Battlesmith membership tier or higher. Please join the FA Battlemaps Patreon at the appropriate level and then re-authenticate by toggling the green "Connected to Patreon" button in the top right.
